phrases: So we meet at last, Ayato Amagiri!
I have been looking forward to this day!
As I am always hearing about you from my master,
I expect great things of you!
Please trigger more exhilaration in me than Kirin Toudou did!
Unfortunately, I cannot guarantee that I will.
All I have to do now is pray that you two are worthy of my respect.
Your body is inefficient enough as it is, so ease up on the inane chatter.
Otherwise, I will make sure you never open that mouth of yours again.
But clearly, you are speaking far more than me.
And besides, I do not have the type of mouth that opens.
I told you to stop trying to get in the last word, right?
How bizarre are those two puppets?
But you know, I am a little glad that we are facing them in the finals.
Because now we can attack them without holding back.
Well, as far as being worthy opponents, I suppose you are right!
Looks like Amagiri's not going to use the Ser=Versta in this match, either!
I think the phrase you are looking for here is cannot use it.
According to one rumor, he is applied for an emergency freezing process.
Well, everyone knows how difficult the Ser=Versta can be.
There might have been some trouble we do not know about.
all I thought was that he would sent it in for maintenance.
I have a souvenir for you to take home.
You can decide after seeing it.
Like it or not, this is the very last match of the Phoenix Festa!
Now, who will be the ones to reach the top?
What is up with this move by the Amagiri/Riessfeld team?
Looks like they are joining forces to crush AR-D together, right at the outset.
Too bad, but I already have the data on that move!
You must be quite confident to leave me by the wayside.
We are keeping an eye on you!
So assuming we are going to go after AR-D together...
what are we going to do about RM-C in the meantime?
We are going to use your state of VijNna.
True, if I use that, I can get a good read on what is going on in the whole arena.
You can grasp RM-C's and my movements simultaneously, right?
We can reduce the risks of fighting two against one by a lot now!
but Amagiri must be predicting RM-C's every move!
Ayato, I am going to bombard him now!
This is the moment I have been waiting for!
I do not believe that armor!
I guess we will have to regroup for now.
Still, they are not going to fall for the same trick twice!
Too bad we could not take him out with that attack just now.
If only I had the Ser=Versta...
Their strategy was to attack me
in order to draw your protective barrier away?
So that whole series of moves was all part of their strategy?!
But apparently this fool's armor was more durable than they would imagined.
What a splendid combination, Ayato Amagiri
Yesterday, more than the day before yesterday...
But apparently, you two have surpassed even us.
Then we have to unveil our secret technique sooner!
There it is, there it is!
Does this mean that we will be seeing that fusion again?
I would intended to do so from the start,
but as usual, you vetoed me, RM-C.
After all, our master told us not to use it lightly.
But in order to defeat you two for sure,
there does not seem to be any other choice.
That fusion thing of yours takes forever to prepare.
And we are not going to miss our chance!
Do you really think our master would not have a countermeasure in place?
ACM Unit, First External Armor, purging all Luxes...
There they are, there they are, there they are!
Now that it is come to this!
Amagiri just charged in, risking certain damage!
Well, he is desperate to stop the fusion, after all.
How unfortunate for you, Ayato Amagiri.
Looks like you were a step too late!
All right, I am leaving the rest to you.
All right, why do not we get Round 2 started?
We are going to rescue you now.
First the Shadows from the first floor, and now this...
It must be someone with the ability to weaponize Shadows.
So they sent in one of their big guns.
If you get in my way, this girl's life will be in the balance.
It will only put you at a disadvantage if you do such a thing!
Then go ahead and give it a shot.
But let me advise you of one thing.
As far as my own welfare is concerned,
that does not concern me in the least.
If you do not get it treated right away...
What can you do in the shape you are in?
Would you like to test me?
Impossible... a virtual image of a sword?
Please stay with us, Lady Toudou!
How did it go, I wonder?
What is the matter with you, Ayato Amagiri?
Any way you look at it, he is gotten way too powerful!
He is on a whole different level than he was in the semifinals!
And he did not throw up multiple protective walls, either!
I am now able to master the use of this surging power far better than before!
How do I describe this joy?
How do I describe this thrill?
This is the true power my master granted me!
What if this is AR-D at his normal specs right now...
It is not impossible, but why would he do such a...
Now, then, let us see you take this hit!
Looks like he is upped the impact, as well.
Come on, we are not done yet by a long shot!
Then how do you like this method?
You will not be dodging me so easily now!
So you can stand even after absorbing that direct hit...
Just what I would expect of you!
Now that it is come to this, even if we both go down...
Now then, looks like this final match has been decided
Ayato, Julis, can you hear me?
Th-That was Seidoukan Academy's student council president just now, right?
No matter how you look at it, that was going too far!
Who knew she would burst into that place just to communicate with us?
Since she is gone the extra mile for us, we cannot lose now!
For Saya and Kirin's sake, too, right?
I have no idea what that was all about.
But all I can do is exert my power to the fullest!
All right, let us go, then...
Seriously, when you are with such a slow, stupid good-for-nothing,
there is never enough time to get anything done, is there?
All right, let me present the preview now while I can.
Such an important duty should be mine to
